attributes.action: WILL YOU NOW CONFIRM the reason the IPCC was not able to correct its wrong Duggan statement.
attributes.additional_details: The vast majority of the people know that the political atmosphere in this country means that politicians and high level taxpayer funded employees DARE NOT speak the truth about ANYTHING for fear of being ostracised and removed from the trough resulting in them being unable to further enrich themselves. If this is not the case then we need to be told why IPCC personnel did not correct their lying statement when they found the police bullet in the radio.
